description: The Powder King Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Powder King for the snow report
Alexa, ask Powder King for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Powder King
shortDescription: The Powder King Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Powder King.
